channel.title: Safe Zones-first person who figures out is mod on my server
channel.description: Can someone tell me how to make my entire server a safe zone? except for wildy? any help? first person to help me figure this out becomes mod on my server! no lies.

item.title: Safe Zones-first person who figures out is mod on my server
item.dc:creator: @Wreckaz Wreckaz
item.description:
@Wreckaz wrote:

if ur using pimpscape source search for

public boolean nonwild()

u should see somithin like this

public boolean nonwild() { if((absX >=2714 && absX <=2771 && absY >=2767 && absY <=3598) || (absX >=2916 && absX <=2935 && absY >=3475 && absY <=3493) || (absX >=2816 && absX <=2830 && absY >=3075 && absY <=3091)) return true; else return false; }
replace that with this

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) return true; else return false; }
that should work

if u cant find “nonwild” try “insafezone”

Read full topic

item.title: Safe Zones-first person who figures out is mod on my server
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Replace public void checkwildy() and public void checkwildy2() with mine: (I’m pretty sure these are wildy coords. Looks right.)

public void checkwildy()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))
{
inwildy = true;
}
else
{
inwildy = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
}
